title: Sharyl Attkisson: "Stonewalled"
description: Michael talks with five-time Emmy Award winning journalist Sharyl Attkisson about her book "Stonewalled: My Fight for Truth Against the Forces of Obstruction, Intimidation, and Harassment in Obama's Washington." Original air date 04 November 2014. The book was published on 04 November 2014.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Sharyl Attkisson)
